title: TFT 9.19 Bug when draw, anyone who had it?
body: When I had a draw with another player after the 15s overtime, we both lost about 30 hp, it was really shocking to see two players with around 60 hp during stage 2-3

replies.body: Originally I was thinking to report this to riot and ask them to do something to make up for it, because it made me 7th in that game, but I wouldn't think riot could care about anything as small as a bug in their game, so whatever.
